flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I'm going to show you how to build a basic air cannon. Although I have some much more exciting projects I first want to see your reaction to this one.
guide.introduction_rendered: I'm going to show you how to build a basic air cannon. Although I have some much more exciting projects I first want to see your reaction to this one.
guide.summary: This project is an exciting one. For years the military put great use into pneumatic tools and weapons. This specific cannon can be used as a flamethrower, a dart rifle and a hair dryer.
guide.title: Air Cannon/Dart Rifle/Flamethrower/Fun
